description:
The investment seeks to provide investment results that, before fees and expenses, track the performance of the Innovation Labs Next Generation Vehicles Index (the "index").
 The fund will normally invest at least 80% of its total assets in securities of the index. The index is designed to measure the performance of a portfolio of companies that have business involvement in the development or use of or investment in "New Energy Vehicles," or "Autonomously Driven Vehicles," such as vehicles capable of driving themselves from a starting point to a predetermined destination in "autopilot" mode using various in-vehicle technologies and sensors.
